name: Redkur
description:
Game 6 + 7 (because I updated it and got no idea for the sevent game)

This game is made for a challenge 7 Days - 7 Games

Basically I will make a game per day in a week.

This game is about infinite parkour and you have to score a lot. This game prepares you for a principal game that I am working on so its like a spoiler ;)

Controls: WASD - Move Mouse - Look around Space - Jump C/Ctrl - Crouch/Slide Shift - Sprint Wall + Space = WallJump Content: Demo: - 7 tiles, landing crouch bug Full: - 13 tiles, landing crouch bug fixed, shadow sharpen (This version will have updates) I STRONGLY RECOMMEND TO DOWNLOAD THE DEMO VERSION BECAUSE THIS GAME WAS MADE ESPECIALLY FOR BACKGROUND GAMEPLAY.
